feed.title: Volatile outlet of thoughts
feed.subtitle: var_dump of whatever Michcioperz is thinking

entry.content: I couldn't wait for the next episode of Inuyashiki anime, so I kinda sat down and read it all until the ending, but what I saw there just put me in the same sort of limbo Lucid9 did. The ending's great, but there's no catharsis in it for me.
